scopes.Team.ReadBasic.All: Read the names and descriptions of teams, on your behalf.Read the names and descriptions of teams, on your behalf.
scopes.TeamSettings.Read.AllTeamSettings.Read.A: Read all teams' settings, on your behalf.Read all teams' settings, on your behalf.

scopes.User.Read.All: Allows the app to read the full set of profile properties, reports, and managers of other users in your organization, on your behalf.Allows the app to read the full set of profile properties, reports, and managers of other users in your organization, on your behalf.
scopes.User.ReadWrite.All: Allows the app to read and write the full set of profile properties, reports, and managers of other users in your organization, on your behalf.
scopes.Directory.Read.All: Allows the app to read data in your organization's directory.
scopes.Directory.AccessAsUser.All: Allows the app to have the same access to information in your work or school directory as you do.
scopes.Directory.ReadWrite.All: Allows the app to read and write all directories
